verses.verse: Moreover take thou <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> for the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

And <S%H559>say<s%>, What is thy <S%H517>mother<s%>? A <S%H3833>lioness<s%>: she lay <S%H7257>down<s%> among <S%H738>lions<s%>, she <S%H7235>nourished<s%> her <S%H1482>whelps<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> young <S%H3715>lions<s%>.

And she brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of her <S%H1482>whelps<s%>: it became a young <S%H3715>lion<s%>, and it <S%H3925>learned<s%> to <S%H2963>catch<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%>; it <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H120>men<s%>.

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> also <S%H8085>heard<s%> of him; he was <S%H8610>taken<s%> in their <S%H7845>pit<s%>, and they <S%H935>brought<s%> him with <S%H2397>chains<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

Now when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H3176>waited<s%>, and her <S%H8615>hope<s%> was <S%H6>lost<s%>, then she <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> of her <S%H1482>whelps<s%>, and <S%H7760>made<s%> him a young <S%H3715>lion<s%>.

And he went up and <S%H1980>down<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H738>lions<s%>, he became a young <S%H3715>lion<s%>, and <S%H3925>learned<s%> to <S%H2963>catch<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%>, and <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H120>men<s%>.

And he <S%H3045>knew<s%> their desolate <S%H490>palaces<s%>, and he laid <S%H2717>waste<s%> their <S%H5892>cities<s%>; and the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H3456>desolate<s%>, and the <S%H4393>fulness<s%> thereof, by the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of his <S%H7581>roaring<s%>. their desolate: or, their widows the fulness: or, all it containeth

Then the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> against him on every <S%H5439>side<s%> from the <S%H4082>provinces<s%>, and <S%H6566>spread<s%> their <S%H7568>net<s%> over him: he was <S%H8610>taken<s%> in their <S%H7845>pit<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>put<s%> him in <S%H5474>ward<s%> in <S%H2397>chains<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>: they <S%H935>brought<s%> him into <S%H4685>holds<s%>, that his <S%H6963>voice<s%> should no more be <S%H8085>heard<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. in chains: or, in hooks

Thy <S%H517>mother<s%> is like a <S%H1612>vine<s%> in thy <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1818><s%>, <S%H8362>planted<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%>: she was <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and full of <S%H6058>branches<s%> by reason of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>. in: or, in thy quietness, or, in thy likeness

And she had <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>rods<s%> for the <S%H7626>sceptres<s%> of them that bare <S%H4910>rule<s%>, and her <S%H6967>stature<s%> was <S%H1361>exalted<s%> among the thick <S%H5688>branches<s%>, and she <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in her <S%H1363>height<s%> with the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of her <S%H1808>branches<s%>.

But she was plucked <S%H5428>up<s%> in <S%H2534>fury<s%>, she was cast <S%H7993>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> dried <S%H3001>up<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit<s%>: her <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>rods<s%> were <S%H6561>broken<s%> and <S%H3001>withered<s%>; the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> them.
And now she is <S%H8362>planted<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, in a <S%H6723>dry<s%> and <S%H6772>thirsty<s%> <S%H776>ground<s%>.

And <S%H784>fire<s%> is gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of a <S%H4294>rod<s%> of her <S%H905>branches<s%>, which hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit<s%>, so that she hath no <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> to be a <S%H7626>sceptre<s%> to <S%H4910>rule<s%>. This is a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%>, and shall be for a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%>.
